SourcedStatement: The Wyoming Legislature, where the GOP controls over 90% of the seats, passed legislation last year banning voters from changing their party registration in the three months before the August primary.
Name: Wyoming Legislature
Justification: body responsible for passing the law limiting party affiliation changes

SourcedStatement: Wyoming’s Republican and Democratic primaries on Tuesday will be the first in modern memory where voters won’t be able to change party affiliation at the polls.
Name: Wyoming Republican and Democratic parties
Justification: context for the primaries being affected by the new law

SourcedStatement: Normally I just roll my eyes and walk away because I’m fighting a losing battle and I’m fully aware of that.
Name: Becky Blackburn
Title: Paralegal for the Republican county attorney
Justification: long-time Democrat in a predominantly Republican area, sharing personal experiences

SourcedStatement: You feel skeevy and dirty when you do it. But you do it anyway and you change it back as soon as you can, because you don’t want to start getting the Republican mailings,
Name: Becky Blackburn
Title: Paralegal for the Republican county attorney
Justification: sharing personal experience of switching party registration to vote in Republican primaries

SourcedStatement: I am who I am, and I have the views that I have. And I don’t care if it bothers people or not.
Name: Becky Blackburn
Title: Paralegal for the Republican county attorney
Justification: expressing commitment to her political views despite being in a minority

SourcedStatement: How far are they going to go to limit one’s ability to vote? If it really comes down to purifying the party, on a voting level all the way up to the elected officials, pretty soon there isn’t going to be anyone left who’s pure enough to be in the party.
Name: Ross Diercks
Title: Former Democratic state representative
Justification: critiquing the new law limiting party affiliation changes, drawing from his experience in the Legislature

SourcedStatement: The best way to participate in meaningful change is to try to sway the dominant party.
Name: Pat Jordan
Justification: sharing his reasoning for registering as a Republican despite holding left-leaning views

SourcedStatement: Most people don’t want to dive into those type of discussions.
Name: Ed Fullmer
Justification: sharing his experience of people avoiding political discussions in the community

SourcedStatement: Party-switching had undermined the sanctity of Wyoming’s primary process.
Name: Chuck Gray
Title: Wyoming’s Republican secretary of state
Justification: explaining the reasoning behind the new law limiting party affiliation changes

SourcedStatement: According to Associated Press election data, Niobrara County’s Democrats, who account for just 2.6% of registered voters, are the most outnumbered by Republicans in the 30 states that track local party affiliation.
Name: Associated Press election data
Justification: used to track and compare party affiliations across states

SourcedStatement: Nationwide, Democrats account for fewer than 3% of voters in three counties this year, up from one county in 2020 but down from seven in 2016, according to the AP data.
Name: Associated Press election data
Justification: used to track changes in Democratic voter registration over time

Name: Democrats switching party registration

Name: Locals in Niobrara County

SourcedStatement: Last winter, dozens of locals gathered outside to honk and cheer as one Democrat left town.
Name: Locals in Niobrara County
